partnerDetails.about:
- IT System Integrator 
Part of our core business to integrate hardware and software together from various brand of products and serving across all industries.

- IT Project Management 
Collaboration between user and vendor carrying the task meeting customer objective in time line.

- Automation and Network Security 
Which our main focus on IP based Surveillance (IP-CCTV), IP based Door Access and industry wireless connectivity.

- vSupport \ Managed Service Provider
Cover from Desktop / laptop Anti-Virus Software, Firewall
(Internal / External) and network security.

- IT Network Design 
To pro-long your IT investment, we provide maintenance and support for every single cent you invest and we commit IT.

- Consultation & Implementation
Our day to day activities selling IT related products from consumable, PC, Laptop up to Server farm related products.
